mapper.sql: id, school, addr, user_name, user_no, longitude, dimension, time, creat_time
mapper.select: SELECT addr, time AS TIMESTAMP FROM `yq_wxgj_collection` WHERE school = #{school} AND user_no = #{no};

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
